welcome_message_body: Welcome to Porto Velho, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Porto Velho has to offer.

restaurants.name: Novo Lenhador
restaurants.description: Novo Lenhador is a restaurant located in Porto Velho.
restaurants.address: Jose de Alencar (Quintino Bocaiuva), Porto Velho, RO

restaurants.name: Sabor Libanês
restaurants.description: Sabor Libanês is a middle eastern restaurant located in Porto Velho.
restaurants.address: Rua José de Alencar, 2062,, Porto Velho, RO

restaurants.name: Ver-o-Peso
restaurants.description: Ver-o-Peso is a brazilian restaurant located in Porto Velho.
restaurants.address: Rogério Weber sub esquina com Dom Pedro II, Porto Velho, RO

restaurants.name: Casa do Tambaqui
restaurants.description: Casa do Tambaqui is a northern brazilian restaurant located in Porto Velho.
restaurants.address: Av. Farquhar, 1008 - Vila Ferroviária (Av. Sete de Setembro), Porto Velho, RO

restaurants.name: Bacarat Restaurante
restaurants.description: Bacarat Restaurante is a bistro located in Porto Velho.
restaurants.address: Av. Pinheiro Machado, 600, Porto Velho, RO, 76820-838

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Governador Jorge Teixeira Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
